group_1.textCenter: Love overcoming class and upbringing?@That's just a delusion...
Listen well, Tsukuyo. Find friends and@partners who are like you.
Otherwise, it's nearly impossible to recover@once your feelings get hurt...

group_1.narration: When we had that conversation, my feelings@were already hurt.
We'll never truly understand one another...
We are just too different in the end.
As those emotions began to swell...
Little by little, we who appear so similar@and yet couldn't be more different began@looking upon each other in a different light.

group_1.textRight: Hey, Tsukuyo, I've got a favor to ask.

group_1.textLeft: I also have a request, Tsukasa.

group_1.narration: Once we brought our grievances to light,@there was no stopping the inferno...

group_1.textRight: I can't believe you looked at me that way!

group_1.textLeft: Your impression of me is quite cruel indeed.

group_1.narration: Tsukasa also had complaints about me...
That I'm a manner-driven, highbrow girl who @is overconfident about my appearance and@uses others to make myself look better...
Once I knew her true feelings, our@conversation devolved into an endless@tirade of accusations and censure.
By the time we were done, my own criticisms@had become utterly irrational.

group_1.textRight: All you care about is how your family@says you're supposed to look and act!
You could lighten up a bit, you know?!
I can't even breathe when I'm around you!

group_1.textLeft: To you "lightening up" means to be uncouth!
I'm not asking for you to spend money!
I'm simply urging you to fix your behavior@to match the most basic rules of etiquette!

group_1.textRight: What do you mean by "fix" huh?!
Actually Tsukuyo, you're the one that needs@a reality check!
Normal girls don't act like that at all!
It's no wonder you don't have any friends,@expecting everyone to be so stuck-up!

group_1.textLeft: You claim to have friends of your own,@but you don't even open up to them!
Your friendships are only skin deep!

group_1.textRight: But they'll never understand! I live a@completely different life from them!

group_1.textLeft: Then you should fully comprehend that I@am dealing with the same circumstances!
I must follow my grandmother's wishes!

group_1.textRight: Did you forget that I've got to take care of@Dad and his students?!

group_1.textLeft: Tsukasa...I don't wish to see you again.

group_1.textRight: Twins, heh. We were just kidding ourselves.

group_1.narration: Thus, my brief friendship with@Tsukasa came to an abrupt end.

group_1.textCenter: Love overcoming class and upbringing?@That's just a delusion...

group_1.narration: Just as my mother had said to me...
